name: elongation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of becoming or making something become longer, and often thinner: Yoga postures emphasize elongation of the spine and help condition the back. Myopia - a vision problem in which things at a distance appear blurry - is caused by an elongation of the eye as it grows. See
elongate
More examplesFewer examplesIf you're stiff, concentrate on static stretching - a slow elongation of the muscles - holding for 15 to 30 seconds.Tyres can be customized to different levels of hardness and elongation.A genetic condition is responsible for his slender physique and the elongation of his limbs.
